concept.title: Ski slope
concept.shortdesc: What is ski slope in general.

conbody.p: Ski slope is usually part of a hill. It is specifically designated for skiing. Therefore you will find no trees in its area and the snow covering it should be plowed by a snowplow, according to ski resort best practices. The result is called man≈æestr...
To get to the top of the slope, you can usually use some kind of tow or a .

The difficulty of a particular slope is measured in color - blue ones are the easiest, red ones are medium and black are holes which you can try only once and nobody sees you ever again. Great for escaping from inconvenient situations with other skiers...
